Home > core > removeReactions.m

removeReactions

PURPOSE

removeReactions

SYNOPSIS

function reducedModel=removeReactions(model,rxnsToRemove,removeUnusedMets,removeUnusedGenes,removeUnusedComps)

DESCRIPTION 

 removeReactions
   Deletes a set of reactions from a model

   model             a model structure
   rxnsToRemove      either a cell array of reaction IDs, a logical vector
                     with the same number of elements as reactions in the model,
                     or a vector of indexes to remove
   removeUnusedMets  remove metabolites that are no longer in use (opt,
                     default false)
   removeUnusedGenes remove genes that are no longer in use (opt, default
                     false)
   removeUnusedComps remove compartments that are no longer in use (opt,
                     default false)

   reducedModel      an updated model structure

   Usage: reducedModel=removeReactions(model,rxnsToRemove,removeUnusedMets,...
           removeUnusedGenes,removeUnusedComps)

   Simonas Marcisauskas, 2016-11-01 - added support for rxnNotes,
   rxnReferences and confidenceScores

CROSS-REFERENCE INFORMATION

This function calls:
  • getIndexes getIndexes
  • removeMets removeMets

  • contractModel contractModel
  • copyToComps copyToComps

  • fitTasks fitTasks
  • gapReport gapReport
  • getElementalBalance getElementalBalance
  • getModelFromHomology getModelFromHomology
  • mergeCompartments mergeCompartments
  • predictLocalization predictLocalization
  • printFluxes printFluxes

  • removeMets removeMets
  • simplifyModel simplifyModel

0025 if nargin<3
0026     removeUnusedMets=false;
0027 end
0028 if nargin<4
0029     removeUnusedGenes=false;
0030 end
0031 if nargin<5
0032     removeUnusedComps=false;
0033 end
0034 
0035 if ischar(rxnsToRemove)
0036     rxnsToRemove={rxnsToRemove};
0037 end
0038 
0039 reducedModel=model;
0040 
0041 if ~isempty(rxnsToRemove) || removeUnusedMets || removeUnusedGenes
0042     indexesToDelete=getIndexes(model,rxnsToRemove,'rxns');
0043 
0044     %Remove reactions
0045     if ~isempty(indexesToDelete)
0046         reducedModel.rxns(indexesToDelete)=[];
0047         if isfield(reducedModel,'lb')
0048             reducedModel.lb(indexesToDelete)=[];
0049         end
0050         if isfield(reducedModel,'ub')
0051             reducedModel.ub(indexesToDelete)=[];
0052         end
0053         if isfield(reducedModel,'rev')
0054             reducedModel.rev(indexesToDelete)=[];
0055         end
0056         if isfield(reducedModel,'c')
0057             reducedModel.c(indexesToDelete)=[];
0058         end
0059         if isfield(reducedModel,'S')
0060             reducedModel.S(:,indexesToDelete)=[];
0061         end
0062         if isfield(reducedModel,'rxnNames')
0063             reducedModel.rxnNames(indexesToDelete)=[];
0064         end
0065         if isfield(reducedModel,'rxnGeneMat')
0066             reducedModel.rxnGeneMat(indexesToDelete,:)=[];
0067         end
0068         if isfield(reducedModel,'grRules')
0069             reducedModel.grRules(indexesToDelete,:)=[];
0070         end

0072             reducedModel.subSystems(indexesToDelete,:)=[];
0073         end
0074         if isfield(reducedModel,'eccodes')
0075             reducedModel.eccodes(indexesToDelete,:)=[];
0076         end

0084             reducedModel.rxnComps(indexesToDelete,:)=[];

0097         end
0098         if isfield(reducedModel,'confidenceScores')
0099             reducedModel.confidenceScores(indexesToDelete,:)=[];
0100         end
0101     end
0102 
0103     %Remove unused metabolites
0104     if removeUnusedMets==true
0105         if isfield(reducedModel,'S')
0106             [usedMets, ~]=find(reducedModel.S);
0107             unUsedMets=true(numel(reducedModel.mets),1);
0108             unUsedMets(usedMets)=false;
0109             reducedModel=removeMets(reducedModel,unUsedMets,false,false,false,removeUnusedComps);
0110         end
0111     end
0112 
0113     %Remove unused genes
0114     if removeUnusedGenes==true && isfield(reducedModel,'rxnGeneMat')
0115         %Find all genes that are not used
0116         [~, b]=find(reducedModel.rxnGeneMat);
0117         toKeep=false(numel(reducedModel.genes),1);
0118         toKeep(b)=true;
0119 
0120         reducedModel.genes=reducedModel.genes(toKeep);
0121         reducedModel.rxnGeneMat=reducedModel.rxnGeneMat(:,toKeep);
0122 
0123         if isfield(reducedModel,'geneShortNames')
0124            reducedModel.geneShortNames=reducedModel.geneShortNames(toKeep);
0125         end
0126 
0127         if isfield(reducedModel,'geneMiriams')
0128            reducedModel.geneMiriams=reducedModel.geneMiriams(toKeep);
0129         end
0130 
0131         if isfield(reducedModel,'geneFrom')
0132            reducedModel.geneFrom=reducedModel.geneFrom(toKeep);
0133         end
0134 
0135         if isfield(reducedModel,'geneComps')
0136            reducedModel.geneComps=reducedModel.geneComps(toKeep);
0137         end
0138     end
0139 else
0140     reducedModel=model;
0141 end
0142 end
